text: Bomarea longipes is a species of plant in the Alstroemeriaceae family. It is endemic to Peru and Ecuador.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Mogollón, H. & Pitman, N. 2003. Bomarea longipes. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
